meanings.definition: Excessively inflated or expanded beyond normal levels.
meanings.sent2: The hyperinflated tire needed to be replaced.
meanings.sent3: The hyperinflated ego of the tiny mouse made the other animals chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The hyperinflated prices at the amusement park left visitors feeling cheated.
meanings.sent5: The hyperinflated balloon animal twisted into intricate shapes at the party.

meanings.sent1: The hyperinflated bubble grew bigger and bigger.
meanings.sent2: The hyperinflated football was difficult to throw accurately.
meanings.sent3: The hyperinflated story about the talking dog made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The hyperinflated expectations for the movie led to disappointment.
meanings.sent5: The hyperinflated balloon floated high above the crowd at the fair.
